page.title: 15CHILTERN GATE, HIGH WYCOMBE
page.content: This is a day or weekly boarding special primary school for children aged 4 to 12 years.The school caters for children who have learning difficulties and certain{health} problems and speech defects.The early stages of{language}developement,like reading and number form the important part of the educational work of the school.{Art and craft}is suitable for these children.Television programmes, singing,physical education and games are included in the weekly programme. All children are taken to and from school in {transport}provided by the education commity;no charge is made to the parents for transport.This is only one in many special schools in the Wycombe District.
